titleStmt.title: The compleat statesman, or, The political will and testament of that great minister of state, Cardinal Duke de Richilieu from whence Lewis the XIV ... has taken his measures and maxims of government : in two parts / done out of French.
titleStmt.author: Richelieu, Armand Jean du Plessis, duc de, 1585-1642.
Du Chastelet, Paul Hay, marquis, b. ca. 1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley ... J. Philips ... and J. Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Also attributed to Paul Hay, marquis Du Chastelet. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Edinburgh University Library.
